text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
P-Producer-san, he's late...!

You didn't read the chat, did you?
He said he's running late.

Ah...
Oh, you're right!

Hey, why were Hinana and
the others called today~?

I think it's about the unit live...!
Like the concept and the staging...?

We're supposed to brainstorm and create the stage
ourselves, right? So maybe it's about discussing that...?

Aha~
Sounds like fun~!

...Shouldn't that sort of thing,
be left to the professionals?

There are expenses and time keeping to take into account.
There doesn't seem much that we can do to decide.

Instead of meddling, 
let's leave the details to the staff.

I feel like we'll improve more
if we focus on practicing instead.

R-Right...!
If we can't sing or dance, there's no point, right...?

Hey, does that mean our
lesson time will be extended~?

...So,
where's the person who called us here?
The producer's running late~!
He'll come, won't he?
...There he is.
Sorry for making you all wait!

I'm so sorry for being late even though
I'm the one who asked to meet up.

...Anyway, let's get started,
but I wanted to talk about the unit live!
